Hi, I’m Shivam Dewangan. Nice to meet you.

My journey as a full-stack developer started over 4 years ago, when i was still a High school graduate. Since then I became curious to learn more about this field. I learned many languages over time, and also took this route in the College by applying in full-stack programming. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.

Designer

I value simple content structure, clean design patterns, and thoughtful interactions.

Things I enjoy designing:

UX, UI, Web, Js Libraries

Frontend Developer

I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.

Languages I speak:

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP

Interested in collaborating with me?
I’m always open to discussing product design work or partnership opportunities.
